message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $600,000 significantly undervalues this product.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This is a reasonable compromise.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, but $900,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $750,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
